info.title: Versioned API
info.description: A REST CMS API based on MongoDB

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: User auth header on the format"Bearer {token}"

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Which fields to sort by, comma separated. Prefix with - (minus) for descending. Default sort is by id desc

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Which page to fetch, defaults to 1 (for pagination)

parameters.name: per-page
parameters.description: Number of documents to fetch (for pagination)

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query - filter out which documents are returned, format is separator:key:value where separator is optional and defaults to comma (,)

parameters.name: published
parameters.description: Whether to only fetch published docs

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: User auth header on the format"Bearer {token}"

301.description: Redirect to HTML page with Swagger API docs

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: User auth header on the format"Bearer {token}"

parameters.name: relationships
parameters.description: Whether to fetch relationships for the document

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Which version of the document to fetch, defaults to the latest version

parameters.name: version_token
parameters.description: Token/digest of version to fetch (for preview)

parameters.name: published
parameters.description: Whether to only fetch published version of document and its relationships

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: User auth header on the format"Bearer {token}"

parameters.description: User auth header on the format"Bearer {token}"
